queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:trace.rack.request.duration{env:$env.value AND region:$region.value AND service:handshake AND resource_name IN (next::student::eventscontroller_home,next::student::eventscontroller_show,next::student::eventscontroller_index,next::student::eventscontroller_search,next::student::eventscontroller_upcoming,next::student::eventscontroller_unified_search,next::student::mobile::v1::eventscontroller_show,next::student::mobile::v1::eventscontroller_index,next::student::mobile::v1::documentscontroller_show,next::student::mobile::v2::commentscontroller_index,next::student::mobile::v1::documentscontroller_index,next::student::mobile::v2::commentscontroller_create,next::student::mobile::v2::documentscontroller_update,next::student::mobile::v1::documentscontroller_pdf_url,next::student::mobile::v2::eventscontroller_unified_search,next::edu::eventscontroller_new,next::edu::eventscontroller_edit,next::edu::eventscontroller_show,next::edu::eventscontroller_index,next::edu::eventscontroller_cancel,next::edu::eventscontroller_create,next::edu::eventscontroller_invite,next::edu::eventscontroller_update,next::edu::eventscontroller_approve,next::edu::eventscontroller_decline,next::edu::eventscontroller_destroy,next::edu::eventscontroller_breakdown,next::edu::eventscontroller_duplicate,next::edu::eventscontroller_send_invite,next::edu::eventscontroller_qualifications,next::employer::eventscontroller_new,next::employer::eventscontroller_edit,next::employer::eventscontroller_show,next::employer::eventscontroller_index,next::employer::eventscontroller_create,next::employer::eventscontroller_update)} by {resource_name}
